article: Romantic and Thoughtful Texts to Send to Your Boyfriend to Make Him Feel Special
intro: Whether you spend every day with your boyfriend or are in a long-distance relationship, there are some things you can’t express verbally. Texting is a great way to show your boyfriend how much he means to you and make him feel like the most special guy in the world. If you’re at a loss for words, keep reading: we’ve compiled a list of deep, romantic texts to send your boyfriend to let him know how much you care.

points.name: “You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me.”
“I love the thought of growing old with you.”
“I’ve found my person, at last. It’s you.”
“I didn’t know it was possible to love someone this much.”
“Life didn’t make sense until I met you.”
“I can’t believe how lucky I am to have found you.”
“I wish I could hold you in my arms and never let go.”
“I can tell you anything.”
“Words can’t express the love I feel for you.”
“I can’t wait to make even more memories with you.”
“I love the way you love me.”
“I’m so comfortable with you.”
“I can’t imagine my life without you in it.”
“Everything you do makes me fall more in love with you.”
“You still give me butterflies, even after all this time.”
“You make me a better person.”
“You’re my lover and my best friend.”
“You are the most important person in my life, now and always.”
“What’s your love language?”
“You’re my favorite person to do everything with.”
“There is no one more perfect for me than you.”
“I’ve realized that I think about you more than anything else.”
“You’ve made me see the world in a whole new way.”
“I miss you when you aren’t with me.”
